fullplot: A madcap portrayal of William Lightbody's stay at the health farm run by cereal king Dr. John Harvey Kellogg. William's wife, Eleanor, has persuaded him to go to Kellogg to have his system cleaned of impurities. Kellogg is very unconventional, and almost barbaric in his treatments.
plot: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early 20th century, run by the eccentric Dr. Kellogg.
title: The Road to Wellville
